articles.title: "Country Is Getting Crazy": Los Angeles Suburb Stunned By Mass Shooting - NDTV
articles.description: The "Year of the Rabbit" began in horror on Sunday for the inhabitants of Monterey Park, the largely Asian American suburb of Los Angeles where a mass shooting left 10 people dead.
articles.content:
The mass killing was the deadliest US shooting since the Uvalde massacre. (File)

articles.title: Black tea may have preventive effect on ovarian cancer – new Chinese meta-analysis - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: The consumption of black tea may lower the risk of ovarian cancer, according to Chinese researchers, although no significant correlation with endometrial cancer and cervical cancer was found.
articles.content:
Previous studies investigating the correlation between tea intake and incidence of gynaecologic cancers have produced conflicting results.

articles.title: Vinyl record collecting is having a resurgence in Singapore – what does 'stan culture' have to do it? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From Teresa Teng to Billie Eilish, record collecting is enjoying a renaissance in Singapore. We asked the folks at Roxy Records, Wildflower Wax Co and Vinyl Kakis – who’s buying them and, more importantly, why?
